name: My Dear Pepe
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 37.

A boy and his toy toad. Match made in heaven. Or is it? Even if it isn't it doesn't matter, because that toad is the only entity in the world he trusts. And he's going to do anything to protect it.
Using turrets and your sword, defend your best friend - Pepe.

Controls:
WASD for movement
Mouse for sword control
Clicking or pressing spacebar skips dialogues.
